insult_phrases: You're more disappointing than an unsalted pretzel.
If Mr. Rogers was your neighbor, he'd move.
Your teeth aren't as white as they could be!
Even Bob Ross thinks you were an accident.
You're like a lighthouse in the middle of a desert; not a lot of use.
Your life is more about regret management than goal achievement, isn't it?
You're less a person and more a loose collection of personality flaws.
The world is a better place when you're asleep.
Do you have life insurance? If yes. Congratulations, you are objectively worth more dead than alive.
I hope every single light is red on your way home today.
You're not even your Mom's favorite child.
The only culture you have is bacteria.
You're a gray sprinkle on a rainbow cupcake.
I'm going to invite your mom out for dinner and then not turn up.
I wish you were a speed bump for my tricycle.
